definition: line thrown from a vessel that people can cling to in order to save themselves from drowning
details:
noun
- line thrown from a vessel that people can cling to in order to save themselves from drowning
- line that raises or lowers a deep-sea diver
- support that enables people to survive or to continue doing something, often by providing an essential connection
= example: support that enables people to survive or to continue doing something, often by providing an essential connection
- a crease on the palm
= synonyms: love line, mensal line, line of destiny, line of Saturn, line of life, life line, line of heart, heart line, line of fate
